titles.title: I will sacrifice to You with the voice of thanksgiving

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sacrifice to You with the voice of thanksgiving
I will pay what I have vowed
Salvation is of the Lord
When my soul fainted within me
I remembered the LORD:
And my prayer came unto You
In Your holy temple

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are a gracious God
And full of mercy
Slow to anger, quick to bless
Only good and of great kindness
You are a gracious God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof
The heavens declare Your glory
Who is like unto You, Oh Lord above all?
Yet You are mindful of me
